I was wondering if there was anyway to get multiplayer to work. I've tried editing the registry key with various serials from the keygen but still says "key is in use" Is it worth reinstalling with a key from the keygen as I used the key in the .nfo to start with.

to t--a--o.

A keygenerator is never and I repeat, NEVER intended to work with internet play or any kind of network outside your LAN. Yes you might get lucky with some but its not that much about luck as a generator in most cases generate a fake key, never a real one. Basicly the chance of generating a key that is a copy of a real copy of the game is next to impossible. Buy the game if you intend to play multiplayer!
Perfect! Now i can finally enjoy this game like i should be able to!
